title: If the champ you're playing uses crit
body:
Chances are it's a scummy pick.

That includes:
-All ADCs
-All melee carries
-Most AD assassins

There is no skill required in building one overpowered stat and doing 1000 damage per auto, through 200 armor. I have no respect for you, and I sincerely hope no one else takes you seriously. Some day, Riot will come to their senses and realize they've lain waaaaay too much power at the feet of RNGesus.

>

I take the high road and write out a constructive post only to receive this? 

This is why the LoL community is the asshole of the larger gaming community. Hitler was right. He was just 70 years too early, and focused on the wrong attributes. People like you would do well in a work camp, I think.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godwin%27s_law

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8jEotM27,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2016-08-08T04:02:29.916+0000)
>
> https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godwin%27s_law

Would you prefer I reference Leopold II's rubber exploitation, Mao's great leap forward, or Stalin's collectivization? All are greater in scale and atrocity than the Nazis. I use it for small minds with small responses in mind. Thank you for confirming that, by the way.
Geez, with how hard you're pushing this I think we're going to have to go to Poe's law.

> [{quoted}](name=Sightless66,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8jEotM27,comment-id=000b0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-08T04:13:26.113+0000)
>
> Geez, with how hard you're pushing this I think we're going to have to go to Poe's law.

Do so if you like, but it always struck me as an empty designation. The extremism is relative to the offended, not the offender. What is extremism to a nihilist? Hitler killing and interring millions? An asteroid wiping out trillions of organisms? In the nigh infinite universal scale, and infinite dimensional scale, what does it matter?

All a matter of perspective.

Or, you could just stop whining and trying to sound intelligent and reasonable when you were bringing up Hitler, trying to defend him, and stating someone should have been in his camps.
I honestly pity you.

Not his camps, he's been dead a while. A work camp. Somewhere you can go to be useful, instead of shitting on your betters' threads. Go ask your mom for some fish sticks or something, kid. Adults are talking.

lmao this troll
thinks he's anything but

No. Remove the randomness from crit and make it less powerful overall. 

Also, armorpen and flat AD builds are the true masterrace. Casters are fine.

randomness?

its called crit CHANCE for a reason. People get strong by getting kills and farm. The items buff them and make them stronger than without it. ADC's are not all casters. Kalista doesnt rely on crit chance but shes AA heavy. This is just a complaining post.

but in are fairness all threads on here well lets say a majority are just a big bi tch fest. 

just saying

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8jEotM27,comment-id=0007000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-08T03:17:55.153+0000)
>
> but in are fairness all threads on here well lets say a majority are just a big bi tch fest. 
>

No, this is constructive. Crit items are simply too powerful. The item overhaul shoehorned too many items for ADC role.

Why does Hurricane have crit?
Why does Phantom Dancer have such a powerful defensive passive?
Why does Essence Reaver give so much fucking CDR?

It's not just crit chance as a stat that's dumb. It's also the items that it happens to be on. This isn't bitching. This is pointing out obvious problems to the people who abuse them.

you wanna know why? wanna know why the adcs get to abuse all the items in the game? because there was a tank meta that everyone cried about , how to you beat tanks? sustained damage with amplifiers so the rework of "marksmen" happen now that they are stronger and people are crying about them we are now looking forward to a "assassins" rework so they can beat the adcs and with items like {{item:3147}} {{item:3142}} most likely being "melee only" soon meaning they will be op on assassins where they will be strong as a class and can beat the adcs cuz you be adcs/sustain damage with burst and how do you beat burst TANKS so its a cycle no one is every happy with the state of the game, people are too spoiled. if you are worried about Ashe being strong, camp her kill her make her life hell. if you dont want yasou 1vs 5 your team BAN HIM there are so many different avenues of gameplay/counter play. 

you wanna know what was broken what had zero counter play? do you remember the days of perma-ban {{champion:38}} and broken as fuk ap {{champion:11}} in season 3 

people cried about zed being to hard to counter so riot nearly gutted him where only the truly good zed can still be zed and the rest are ineffective. people keep crying its gonna be that way with everything. instead of getting {{item:3116}}  or {{item:3031}}  or {{item:3025}} for items you will get to by pillows and foam fingers and we will have a tickle pillow fight for an hour and 10 mins

Oh, yes, yes. I remember them. I remember Feral Flare meta, Cinderhulk meta, League of Warmogs, League of Black Cleavers, waveclear meta, etc.

But you know what? The only role, the only champs, the only aspect of this game that has never waned has been the botlane ADC. Since before I started playing in season 2, there has always been an insatiable need for that role, and entire metas have risen and fallen with the intent of countering them, but to no avail. Here we are, season 6, when ADCs, despite 6 seasons of meta domination, now have unparalleled power. It's disgusting.

*whooosh*

The sound of it going over your head is deafening. But please, continue. I will not stop your diarrhea of the brain. I've come to expect no better from the ADC mains that make up G&B. It's a travesty Riot listens to you.

{{item:3143}}  see this? This counters it. Try it. And if youre a bursty mage. Win lane so you can 1 shot them. In team fights, focus the adc. Idk what else to tell you. This isnt the place to really complain about the core mechanics of a main role. Sorry to upset you

Congratulations, collect your free win. But really, using mechanical demands in an LoL argument is so bad. Play some SC2 and get back to me.

The thing is, Annie and TF are outliers. Virtually the entire ADC class can do this end game.

if you dont want {{champion:51}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:96}} to ace a team in seconds and do 1000 damage per auto dont let the game go beyond 30mins. all adcs become hyper carries late. they are the most item dependent class of champs on the game, they typically have no def stats and require a babysitter aka support for 20 mins in the game and in team fights a front line to keep people off of them . win early push your lead and the push the advantage win the game before {{champion:96}} gets 6 items and and sold his boots and has {{item:2140}}

Ranged champions have an inherently stronger early game than melee. This will never not be true. The early game power of ADCs has always intentionally been understated. The truth is, comparing stats in a vacuum is dumb. The truth is, there isn't a melee character in the game, who starting off at an ADC's max range, can run up and kill them before they're killed at level 1. 

And while you say "Of course, that's dumb, no one would do that" keep in mind that last season an entirely new class of champions was released who do EXACTLY that (Juggernauts), and if Mordekaiser is truly a juggernaut, than they are expected to do so with LOWER base stats than those supposedly weak early game ADCs.

You realize that to deal 1,000 damage through 200 armor, they need to do 3,000 damage per AA before damage reduction.  2,000 - 2,500 damage per AA if their armor pen reduces it to 100-150. 

You don't get to call this a constructive thread when you make shit up to complain about.

> [{quoted}](name=Wanfear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8jEotM27,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2016-08-08T04:33:52.669+0000)
>
> You realize that to deal 1,000 damage through 200 armor, they need to do 3,000 damage per AA before damage reduction.  2,000 - 2,500 damage per AA if their armor pen reduces it to 100-150.
> 
> You don't get to call this a constructive thread when you make shit up to complain about.

Except that 2000 is still totally in the range of late game ADCs, and 100 isn't even that much to reduce.

> [{quoted}](name=Incognonymous,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8jEotM27,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2016-08-08T04:36:22.017+0000)
>
> Except that 2000 is still totally in the range of late game ADCs, and 100 isn't even that much to reduce.

It's in range of a Draven IE crit with 450AD and Q spinning.  The only other in that range is Jhin's 4th shot.  It's impossible for most other ADCs to reduce armor by 100 and also build enough AD and crit chance to get there.
So does this include champs like anivia and Ryze?

Looks like I struck a nerve.
